function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential reverse stack effect at the Virginia house during the summer months","Impact":"Decreased mixing between floors, leading to potential concentration of contaminants in specific areas","Mitigation":"Ensure proper ventilation and circulation to counteract the reverse stack effect","Technologies":"HVAC systems, air purifiers, fans","People":"Residents, occupants, visitors","Owner":"Homeowner, building management"},{"Description":"Tracer concentrations exceeding safe levels due to poor mixing and ventilation","Impact":"Risk of exposure to high concentrations of contaminants, leading to health issues and illness","Mitigation":"Regular maintenance of ventilation systems, use of air purifiers, and monitoring of tracer concentrations","Technologies":"Ventilation systems, air purifiers, indoor air quality monitors","People":"Residents, occupants, visitors","Owner":"Building management, facilities maintenance team"},{"Description":"Tracer gas release leading to uneven distribution and concentration of contaminants","Impact":"Unequal exposure to contaminants, increasing health risks for individuals in certain areas","Mitigation":"Proper calibration and monitoring of tracer gas release, optimization of ventilation systems for even distribution","Technologies":"Tracer gas detectors, ventilation system controls","People":"Residents, occupants, visitors","Owner":"Building management, facilities maintenance team"}]}
